code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72844375 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
